price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߌߓߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߤߌߡߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߲ߘߦߊ ߘߴߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߕߎ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߖߐ߫
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
